DataElementConcept.preferredName: Immune System Disorder Other Severe Combined Immunodeficiency Classification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disorder resulting from an abnormality in the immune system. -- 2003_Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._X-linked or autosomal recessive disorder characterized by defects of both humoral and cell mediated immunity, resulting in low or absent antibody levels, leukopenia, marked susceptibility to infections, and early death.--2004_A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder resulting from an abnormality in the immune system. -- 2003
